SKY COACH
SERVICE
We're happy to welcome you aboard your Slay
Coach! We believe you'll enjoy your flight, particu-
larly when you think of the appreciable saving that
Sky Coach travel means to you.
To make that saving possible, you'll notice we've
put in more seats than usual. And some of the lux-
urious features of TWA Skyliner service, such as
complimentary meals, free accommodations in the
event of delay enroute, more than one hostess to
each plane, family fares or round-trip discounts,
and a few other personal services are not included
in Sky Coach travel. It means greatly reduced fares,
advantagent mavel beople can now take the fullest
TWA Sky Coach travel means you're flying with
one of the largest regularly scheduled airlines in
the world, with more than twenty years of experi-
ence and a splendid record of performance and
dependability.
You can be sure that every care is
taken to maintain the highest performance stand-
ards for all Sky Coach flights.
There's a regular TWA flight crew up front in
your plane, with long experience flying the route
you're on right now. And ground maintenance and
flight control are of course as exacting as they are
for all
TWA's
and international
operations. Thats why TWA Sky Coachernatio na-
mous for dependable, speedy, convenient service.
This flight packet contains booklets and information
about TWA and flying in general which we hope
will be interesting to you. Please accept it with our
compliments.

The Team on the Ground
Like an iceberg with nine-tenths of its balk hidden beneath the water,
most of TWA's personnel are not seen by the flying public. In fact, for
every TIA eres member in the air. there are y I WA men and women
the ground. They include maintenance mechanics, station mana
cers, ground radio men, aeronautical engineers, radio engincers,
neople and other TIA personnel on the round all over the world work

E TRANS WORLD AIRLINES
NOTICE: To satisfy the unusual demand for TWA services,
TWA will be adding new flights at 5-day intervals during
the summer months. After the effective period of this special
timetable supplement, please call your local travel agent or
your nearest TWA office for latest flight information, or osk
for a cooy of the latest revised timetable supolement.
Consult any TWA agent or representative for current rates
and general information. We regret that we are unable to
publish oll TWA flight information in a single folder during
this time of rapidly increasing schedules.
